course.subject: SBMT
course.name: Business Chinese for MBA students
course.description: This is a course for MBA students with non-Chinese language backgrounds. It enhances students' ability in understanding spoken Putonghua, and takes them to a higher level of communicative competence in speaking and writing Chinese in business situations. Students are expected to have at least 120 hours of prior tuition in Chinese language, or have passed the admission test for this course. Graded P or F.
